Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Riverdell Way, east of the Bows & Arrows Unlimited bowyer shop.
Room.LongDescription: The impressive Bows & Arrows Unlimited bow shop satisfies both the beginner and the expert archer, and everyone in between. All sorts of bows and arrows my be purchased in the shop, run by a number of elves who can also craft weapons to your exact proportions. The fine bows are cherished by all those who purchase from the shop and envied by those who do not have the money to buy the best.
